<title level="1" right="Hazard 12" pfs="">[Polymorph Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=479)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A Druidic glyph attempts to transform a trespasser into an animal.

---

**Stealth**
DC 34 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 32 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (master) to drain the glyph’s power harmlessly, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) (6th rank; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) DC 30) to counteract the glyph

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Cursed Metamorphosis** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) **Trigger** A creature moves within 30 feet of the glyph without speaking the passphrase in Druidic; **Effect** The creature is targeted by [_cursed metamorphosis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1479) (DC 32 Will save).
